thread.title: Man United transfer news: Franck Kessie 'flattered' by interest | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United transfer news: Franck Kessie 'flattered' by interest | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United transfer news: Franck Kessie 'flattered' by interest | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 5:11 pm Kessie has attracted plenty of attention (Picture: AFP/Getty) 
Franck Kessie has admitted he’s flattered by Manchester United ’s interest in him and believes it’s a sign of how much he’s progressing. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Ivory Coast international has been linked with many top clubs around Europe, including Chelsea, after a breakthrough season that’s seen him score six goals in Serie A from central midfield. 
Jose Mourinho is keen to add another midfielder to his ranks as Michael Carrick moves towards the end of his career and he believes his side are a little short in that department. Carrick’s career is coming to an end (Picture: AFP/Getty) 
The 20-year-old star, who is an international team-mate of Eric Bailly, is believed to be near the top of his shortlist and Kessie has now spoken out about their interest. 
‘I am very flattered that clubs of this level are interested in me,’ he told So Foot. 
‘This proves I’m having a good season, that I continue to progress. I don’t want to go too fast.
